pkgmetadata.longdescription: Thinkfan is a simple, lightweight fan control program. Originally designed specifically for IBM/Lenovo Thinkpads, it now supports any kind of system via the sysfs hwmon interface. It is designed to eat as little CPU power as possible.

use.flag: Use dev-libs/libatasmart to read temperatures directly from hard disks
Allows to read GPU temperatures from the proprietary nVidia driver x11-drivers/nvidia-drivers
Support the more flexible YAML config file format
